mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_SEQ, U.USER_SEQ, M.TITLE, M.MK_SEQ, M.PRICE, TO_CHAR(M.MK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MK_DATE, M.USER_NAME FROM MARKET M LEFT JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ
SELECT M.MK_SEQ, M.TITLE, M.READ_CNT, M.USER_NAME, CONTENTS, TO_CHAR(M.MK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MK_DATE FROM MARKET M, USER_INFO U WHERE M.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ AND M.MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MARKET SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
UPDATE MARKET SET TITLE = #{title}, NOTICE_YN = n, CONTENTS = #{contents}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
